titles.title: Bowed With A Burden (familiar easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bowed with a burden None can weigh save Thee Strength of my life on Thee I cast my care My heart must prove Its own infirmity But what shall move me If my God be there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh for a thankful song With every breath While amid fading flowers And withering grass I with Thee Through the grave And gate of death On to my joyful Resurrection pass{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Armed with the spirit Of my Master's mind How shall I spare A thought that He would slay Lord I would leave Those things which are behind And press toward Heav'n through all The narrow way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bright be my prospect As I pass along And ardent service At the cost of all Love by untiring Ministry made strong And ready for the first The softest call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes God is faithful And my lot is cast Oh not myself to serve My own to be Light of my life The darkness now is past And I beneath the Cross Can work for Thee{/lang-eng}
